title: Love Island Australia: Grant Crapp rejects comparisons to Maurice Salib
text:
Love Island Australia star Maurice Salib has been accused of dumping model Christie Swadling two weeks before going on the show.

And now Grant Crapp, who faced a similar 'secret girlfriend' scandal during last year's season, has rejected claims that Maurice is following in his footsteps.

Taking to Instagram, Grant insisted that Maurice is nothing like him.

'This flog wishes he was me!' Love Island 2018 winner Grant Crapp has rejected comparisons to Maurice Salib - as the new contestant faces a similar 'secret girlfriend' scandal

'Who is this w**ker?... if he wins let me know,' Grant wrote in response to Maurice saying in an interview there is 'no way' he'd dump someone for Love Island.

Grant also reposted a fan's comment, which read: 'This flog wishes he was you champ, your the Love Island goat [greatest of all time].'

It comes after Maurice said he would never apply for Love Island while being in a secret relationship, which Grant allegedly did last year.

Scandal: Following Monday's season two premiere of Love Island, Christie Swadling claimed she and Maurice (pictured) had been dating until two weeks before he went on the show

Controversial: Grant Crapp (left) split with Tayla Damir (right) just days after winning the show last year following rumours he had a 'secret girlfriend'

Speaking to TV Week, the 27-year-old media executive said: 'I have a lot more dignity than that! It's so interesting he's done that.'

'I'm not one to judge. Good on you if that's what you want to do,' he added, referring to Grant's decision to reunite with his ex Lucy Cartwright after winning $50,000 on Love Island 2018 with Tayla Damir.

Following Monday's season two premiere of Love Island, Christie Swadling claimed she and Maurice had been dating until two weeks before he went on the show.

Drama: Taking to Instagram, Grant hit back at Maurice after he insisted he would never film the show while being in a secret relationship

'Your the Love Island goat!' Grant also shared a comment from a fan who claimed the pair weren't alike

Christie, who claims their relationship was 'serious', labelled Maurice as 'trash' and shared several Instagram posts mocking him.

She later described her ex as a 'narcissist' and claimed he only applied for Love Island to be famous.

'To me it makes no sense. He's ended love to go find love on the show,' she said on The Kyle and Jackie O Show.
description: Love Island Australia star Maurice Salib has been accused of dumping model Christie Swadling two weeks before going on the show.
authors: Mary Mrad For Daily Mail Australia
